content: Payload is too large to display.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when the response payload exceeds a certain size limit. It is intended to be shown as an alternative label in a button. Translators should provide a concise and clear equivalent for this message that can be displayed in various UI contexts, such as buttons or error messages.

usage.context:
{t("ResponsePostBody")}
 </Text>
 {responsePayload.length > 4000 || numberOfLines > 100 ? (
 <LargePayloadStub>
 <Text fontWeight={600} color={globalColors.lightGrayDark}>
 {t("PayloadIsTooLarge")}
 </Text>
 <Button
 className="view-raw-payload"
 size="small"
 onClick={openRawPayload}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation is understandable, a more natural and commonly used phrasing in Saudi Arabic would be preferable. The current translation, 'الحمولة كبيرة جدًا بحيث لا يمكن عرضها,' is a bit literal and clunky.

The translation 'Məlumat yükü göstərilməyəcək qədər böyükdür' is a bit literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Payload is too large to display' in a natural way. It implies the information load is too big *to be displayed*, rather than the payload itself being too large for processing or transmission.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'Göstərinməsi üçün yük çox böyükdür' or 'Yükun həddi aşdırılmışdır' which more accurately reflects the problem of the payload being too large.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Náklad je příliš velký na to, aby se zobrazil' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Czech. 'Náklad' specifically refers to cargo or shipment, not a payload in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zpráva je příliš velká na zobrazení.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'payload' is a technical term. 'Náklad' doesn't accurately represent this meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The suggested replacement 'Zpráva' (message) is a better fit for 'payload' in this context, assuming the payload is a data message.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tietosisältö on liian suuri näytettäväksi' is technically correct but not ideal. 'Tietosisältö' (data content) is a bit formal and verbose for a user-facing error message. A more natural and concise phrasing would be better.

The translation 'Օգտակար բեռը չափազանց մեծ է ցուցադրելու համար:' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'Payload is too large to display.' It's a bit clunky and verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise and natural translation like 'Բեռը չափազանց մեծ է' or 'Բեռն անչափ մեծ է' which conveys the same meaning more effectively.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Lietderīgā slodze ir pārāk liela, lai to parādītu' is technically correct but a bit formal and verbose for a user-facing error message. 'Payload' is a technical term that may not be understood by all users. A more user-friendly alternative would be to focus on the problem, not the technical cause.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kļūda: datu apjoms ir pārāk liels.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dane właściwe są zbyt obszerne, aby je wyświetlić' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Payload is too large to display.' 'Dane właściwe' translates to 'proper data' which isn't quite right. 'Payload' refers to the data being sent, not necessarily 'proper' data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like 'Przesyłany plik jest zbyt duży, aby go wyświetlić.' or 'Ładunek jest zbyt duży, aby go wyświetlić.' where 'Przesyłany plik' means 'transmitted file' or 'Ładunek' keeps the more technical term.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙම payload පෙන්වීමට විශාල වැඩිය.' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Payload is too large to display.' A more accurate translation would emphasize the size preventing display.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම payload ප්‍රමාණය පෙන්වා ගැනීමට වැඩී.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'වැඩි' is a bit awkward. While technically correct, it's not the most natural wording in Sinhala when describing size limitations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම payload ප්‍රමාණය පෙන්වා ගැනීමට වැඩී.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dátový obsah je príliš veľký na to, aby sa mohol zobraziť' is a bit verbose and formal for a user-facing error message. A more concise and natural translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dáta sú príliš veľké na zobrazenie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Dáta' is preferred over 'Dátový obsah' in this context. It's more commonly used for 'data' in Slovak.
The word 'payload' is transliterated as 'Паyлоад'. The correct transliteration is 'Пeyлоад'.

The translation 'Payload görüntülenemeyecek kadar büyük.' is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Payload is too large to display.' A more natural Turkish phrasing might convey that the payload cannot be processed or shown due to its size.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Payload çok büyük olduğu için işlenemiyor veya gösterilemiyor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Корисне навантаження завелике для показу' isn't the most natural or clear way to convey 'Payload is too large to display' in Ukrainian. 'Payload' is a technical term and doesn't always have a direct, easy equivalent. While 'корисне навантаження' is a valid translation, it might be perceived as overly technical for a general user. A more user-friendly translation might be preferred.
The phrase 'для показу' can be slightly improved for flow and clarity. 'для відображення' is a more direct and common translation of 'to display' in this context.

The translation '负载过高，无法显示' while conveying a similar meaning, isn't the most accurate rendering of 'Payload is too large to display.' '负载' primarily refers to load or burden, while 'payload' in a technical context refers to data being sent. A better translation would capture the data aspect.
